    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getTranslation(io.sphere.sdk.models.LocalizedString localizedString)
      Finds the best fitting translation trying the following languages in that order: - the users preferred language - one of the users fallback languages - one of the projects languages Falls back to an empty String if none is found in the former
      static TranslationResolverImpl of(java.util.List<java.util.Locale> locales)

      • getTranslation

        public java.lang.String getTranslation(io.sphere.sdk.models.LocalizedString localizedString)
        Finds the best fitting translation trying the following languages in that order: - the users preferred language - one of the users fallback languages - one of the projects languages Falls back to an empty String if none is found in the former
        Specified by:
        getTranslation in interface TranslationResolver
        Parameters:
        localizedString - the source to find the translation
        Returns:
        the found translation or an empty String
